sect3.title: Program Files

sect4.title: config.charset
sect4.para: The config.charset script outputs a system-dependent table of character encoding aliases.

sect4.title: config.rpath
sect4.para: The config.rpath script outputs a system-dependent set of variables, describing how to set the run time search path of shared libraries in an executable.

sect4.title: gettext
sect4.para: The gettext package is used for internationalization (also known as i18n) and for localization (also known as l10n). Programs can be compiled with Native Language Support (NLS) which enable them to output messages in the user's native language rather than in the default English language.

sect4.title: gettextize
sect4.para: The gettextize program copies all standard gettext files into a directory. It's used to make a package with gettext translations.

sect4.title: hostname
sect4.para: The hostname program displays a network hostname in various forms.

sect4.title: msgattrib
sect4.para: The msgattrib program filters the messages of a translation catalog according to their attributes and manipulates the attributes.

sect4.title: msgcat
sect4.para: The msgcat program finds messages which are common in several raw translations.

sect4.title: msgcmp
sect4.para: The msgcmp program compares two raw translation files.

sect4.title: msgcomm
sect4.para: The msgcomm program searches messages which appear in several .po files. It's used to compare how things are translated.

sect4.title: msgconv
sect4.para: The msgconv program converts a translation catalog to a different character encoding.

sect4.title: msgen
sect4.para: The msgen program creates an English translation catalog.

sect4.title: msgexec
sect4.para: The msgexec program applies a command to all translations of a translation catalog.

sect4.title: msgfilter
sect4.para: The msgfilter program applies a filter to all translations of a translation catalog.

sect4.title: msgfmt
sect4.para: The msgfmt program compiles raw translation into machine code. It's used to create the final program/package translation file.

sect4.title: msggrep
sect4.para: The msggrep program extracts all messages of a translation catalog that match a given pattern or belong to some given source files.

sect4.title: msginit
sect4.para: The msginit program creates a new PO file, initializing the meta information with values from the user's environment.

sect4.title: msgmerge
sect4.para: The msgmerge program combines two raw translations into one file. It's used to update the raw translation with the source extract.

sect4.title: msgunfmt
sect4.para: The msgunfmt program decompiles translation files into raw translation text. It can only be used if the compiled versions are available.

sect4.title: msguniq
sect4.para: The msguniq program unifies duplicate translations in a translation catalog.

sect4.title: ngettext
sect4.para: The ngettext program displays native language translations of a textual message whose grammatical form depends on a number.

sect4.title: project-id
sect4.para: The project-id script prints a package's identification package version or package.

sect4.title: team-address
sect4.para: The team-address script prints the team's address to stdout and outputs additional instructions.

sect4.title: trigger
sect4.para: The trigger script tests whether the current package is a GNOME or KDE package.

sect4.title: urlget
sect4.para: The urlget program gets the contents of a URL.

sect4.title: user-email
sect4.para: The user-email script prints the user's email address, with confirmation from the user.

sect4.title: xgettext
sect4.para: The xgettext program extracts the message lines from the programmers' C files. It's used to make the first translation template.
